bio_passion: I'm deeply passionate about Brand Stories, Google & Meta Ads, and Content Creation in social media crafting innovative digital strategies.
bio_7: But my passions aren't just confined to marketing. Embracing the life of a digital nomad, I combine marketing with my love for travel.
bio_8: Music is another love. A multi-instrumentalist at heart.
bio_9: When it comes to gaming, the PS5 is my sanctuary.

bio_10: On the move, I'm an enthusiastic rider, always seeking out new adventures on the horizon.
bio_11: The world of investments intrigues me, always on the prowl for opportunities in stocks, mutualfunds, or grasping the intricacies of financial markets.
bio_first_job: My career took off as an Digital Marketing Intern, with Ad campaigns as my initial muse.
bio_12: But if there's one thing that defines me: I never cease to learn, build, and chase new adventures.

bio_1: Back in 2022, I made a significant leap, transitioning from a exciting finance background to immerse myself in the world of digital marketing.
bio_2: Since then Every day, Chennai's vibrant culture and landscapes fuel my inspiration to tell various stories every brand strives to tell.
bio_3: I embarked on my professional journey as an intern, diving deep into world of Ads Campaigns and Content Management before evolving into a full fledged Digital Marketer..
bio_4: Currently, I'm deeply engrossed in to the huge galaxy of paid media campaigns solutions.
bio_5: I have a penchant for blending dreams with stories, to tell the world what they wish to hear.
bio_start_coding: I made my foray into the world of Digital Marketing in 2022, and it's been an exhilarating journey since.
bio_6: Being a Digital Marketer, I've worked with various clients in diverse sectors and industries.
